DOC.brief_summary: This observational study lone Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting procedure endoscopic vein graft harvest use best harvesting practice .
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Improvement Vein Graft Patency Long Term Implementation Of Novel Endoscopic Harvesting Techniques
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-center , non-randomized , observational study 100 patient undergo routine coronary artery bypass grafting . Eligible candidate undergo lone Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) procedures endoscopic vein harvest use best harvesting practice , define : systemic heparinization prior vein manipulation , standardization vein graft harvest technique , pressure limit syringe 3 month use dual anti-platelet therapy . Patients undergo CT angiography 30 day 12 month assess vein graft patency .

Patient comorbid condition opinion investigator pose undue risk successful endovascular harvesting vein
